meanings.definition: A sticky substance used for joining things together.
meanings.sent1: The glues in the craft store come in many colors.
meanings.sent2: I need some glues to fix my broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got stuck in a puddle of glues.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acts as the glues that hold our family together.
meanings.sent5: The glues oozed out of the bottle like a colorful river of stickiness.

meanings.definition: To join or attach with glue.
meanings.sent1: She carefully glues the pieces of paper together.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter glues the wood to make a sturdy table.
meanings.sent3: The magician glues the cards together to perform a trick.
meanings.sent4: His smile glues the team in unity during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The artist glues the petals onto the canvas, creating a beautiful flower.
